other_tests.procedure_name: CT ABDOMEN AND PELVIS WITH CONTRAST
other_tests.findings: Inflammatory changes in the right lower quadrant adjacent to a dilated hyperemic 7 mm appendix. Degree of inflammatory changes have improved compared to prior CT. There is a small rim enhancing collection measuring 1.3 x 1.3 x 2.2 cm. No free air.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Degree of inflammatory changes have improved compared to prior CT.
